sourceDesc.p: Data regarding the biographies of the jengleurs and troubadours was mainly extracted from the databases Base de datos da Lírica Profana Galego-Portuguesa (MedDB) and Cantigas Medievais Galego Portuguesas [base de dados online] .
Coordinates were taken from GeoHack and Google Maps.

sourceDesc.bibl: Base de datos da Lírica Profana Galego-Portuguesa (MedDB), versión 2.3.3, Centro Ramón Piñeiro para a Investigación en Humanidades http://www.cirp.es

Lopes, Graça Videira; Ferreira, Manuel Pedro et al. (2011-), Cantigas Medievais Galego Portuguesas [base de dados online]. Lisboa: Instituto de Estudos Medievais, FCSH/NOVA. http://cantigas.fcsh.unl.pt.

encodingDesc.p: Metadata model similar to the one used by MedBB

person.persName: Pedro de Portugal, Conde de Barcelos

person.affiliation: San Vicente de Ver (Terra de Lemos) 42.596718,-7.714381
